modName: Add All Shouts updated for USLEEP LOOT load order
summary:
With USLEEP out the file I made this from was outdated, so I updated it.

Drop this in the folder with your Skyrim.exe, hit "~" ingame and type "bat addshouts".
descriptionHtml:
With USLEEP out the file I made this from was outdated, so I updated it.
